import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import Multistep from "react-multistep"; import StepOne from "./StepOne"; import StepTwo from "./StepTwo"; import StepThree from "./StepThree"; import StepFour from "./StepFour"; import PageTitle from "../../../layouts/PageTitle"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Wizard = () => { const [voitures, setVoitures] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:8800/api/voitures"); setVoitures( res.data.map((item) => { return { value: item._id, label: item.nom + " (" +item.matricule + ")" }; }) ); }; fetchUser(); }, []); const ClearIndicatorStyles = (base, state) => ({ ...base, cursor: "pointer", color: state.isFocused ? "blue" : "black", }); const CustomClearText = () => "clear all"; const ClearIndicator = (props) => { const { children = , getStyles, innerProps: { ref, ...restInnerProps }, } = props; return (
{children}
); }; const prevStyle = { background: "#43DC80", borderWidth: "0px", color: "#fff", borderRadius: "4px", fontSize: "14px", fontWeight: "600", padding: "0.55em 2em", border: "1px solid #43DC80", marginRight: "1rem", }; const nextStyle = { background: "#43DC80", borderWidth: "0px", color: "#fff", borderRadius: "4px", fontSize: "14px", fontWeight: "600", border: "1px solid #43DC80", padding: "0.55em 2em", }; return (
